text: Levente Andrei Bartha (born 8 March 1977) is a Romanian bobsledder. He competed in the 2006 and 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Bobsledders at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Romanian male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Romania Category:Romanian people of Hungarian descent
title: Levente Bartha
